lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I live with my wife in Moshi, Tanzania and see firsthand how these small loans make a huge difference in the lives of the people here. GO KIVA!
lender.occupational_info: I work to help enrich the lives of those less fortunate, whether they be sick, orphaned or simply down on their luck.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: It feels good :) I'm happy to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I select different types of bead, from pearls to glass beads to gemstones and try to create something beautiful with them!

lender.name: Clint and Barb
lender.loan_because: We are grateful for the life that has been afforded to us. The blessings that have been bestowed on us should not end with us.
lender.occupational_info: We both contract our time to companies involved in drug development.

lender.name: Lindy
lender.loan_because:
It's the right thing to do. Everyone's small impact adds up to great change.
"Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime”-- Anonymous

lender.name: Hannah and Stephen
lender.loan_because: we like to see the money go directly to the people who need it the most.
lender.occupational_info: We teach English in South Korea.

lender.name: floyd
lender.loan_because: I have lived in several countries in Asia and the Middle East. The most important thing I learned is that we all have to be our brother keeper.
lender.occupational_info: I am now a small scale rancher and farmer. I am retired from the nuclear field.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: Can you imagine if everyone did this....how great it would be!
lender.occupational_info: I own/operate a massage practice

lender.name: Leonora
lender.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurs will fuel the economic revival.
lender.occupational_info: I run a SaaS software company.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to help people start their own businesses so they can improve their own lives and those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I teach social work to college students.

lender.name: Arthur Kroeger College of Public Affairs
Angie
lender.loan_because: For me it is a great way to respectfully share my gifts with people in worse economical circumstances than mine.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. I can do that through KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in a small local hospital.

lender.name: Melody
lender.loan_because: It's brings joy to me and to the receiver.
lender.occupational_info: Office manager.

lender.name: Brandy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others live their lives to the fullest, regardless of their given circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I write things to try and make people laugh, be happy, and above all, think.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part in helping eliminate poverty in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate an Information Technology consulting company.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: I want to empower women to rise from humble roots and to take wing.

lender.name: Sabine
lender.loan_because: I live in well circumstances, others are born in a difficult world. I hope my money reaches direct the people.
lender.occupational_info: I restore teeth together with a dentist.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: it's an honor and duty to support others in pursuit of their dreams.

lender.name: Sinikka
lender.loan_because: It is a reliable way to help those who are trying so hard to help themselves and their families,
lender.occupational_info: I study social relationships. I became a sociologists because I was always asking myself why people treat each other the way they do. We often hurt each other because we don't understand each other and our cultural differences. I love to learn about different languages and cultures.

lender.name: David & Venus
lender.loan_because:
Do not merely listen to the word, and so deceive yourselves. Do what it says.
James 1v22

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: God has given me a life of prosperity living in such a privileged country as the U.S. and want to share what I have been given with others.

lender.name: Olive
lender.loan_because: It is one more way to help another soul realize their potential
lender.occupational_info: I write and I help others with their writing by editing their work so they can get their message out to the world. I heal others so they can continue on their path to God. I teach to share wisdom and lift whom I meet to the next stage of their life, whatever that is for them.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: A loan is sustainable and requires more accountability than free money. I loan because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work on installation and maintenance of power plants.

lender.name: Mommy loves Fox
lender.loan_because: Because I think if you can help, you should help.
lender.occupational_info: I want Fox to see that if you have the ability to help people, that you should do it...and that by helping them, your really helping youself to grow as a human being.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I believe in the Kiva-Concept. I think, it's a great opportunity to support new entrepreneurs on their way to a successful business.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my life and I want to express my thanks to Him by helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computer software projects for a non-profit financial services company.

lender.name: CR Outreach Program
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: We reach out to help others in any way we can.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: If people help, and network with each other, then we can all make our dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I love traveling the world and recording the images I see. I like to use photography as a medium to show people the beauty of the cultures that make up our great world.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: It is good to share and help other people.
lender.occupational_info: Kindergarten student

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: Love Makes The World Go Round
lender.occupational_info: Pay It Forward

lender.name: EDM on behalf of CN
lender.loan_because: CN has taught us about giving back and we will miss her!

lender.name: Erika & Caleb
lender.loan_because: we do want we can to help others, even if it doesn't seem like much.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a nursing home in the activities department. I help keep the residents busy and happy. Caleb is in school and is a very good student!!

lender.name: Kazuko & Jonathan
lender.loan_because: we wanna help, in a small way :)

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and companies communicate when they are going through difficult or complex situations.

lender.name: Tyrone
lender.loan_because: There is truth in the adage "it takes money to make money."

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I work primarily in the energy industry, ensuring environmental compliance for large energy infrastructure construction projects...

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I have a calling to help women empower themselves through smart money management.
lender.occupational_info: I help women save, invest and manage their money to create financial independence and increase self confidence.

lender.name: Dee Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who need assistance in order to provide for their family. We are so blessed in our country to have resources available to help us reach our dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school business classes.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to have no one give you a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Creative but precise.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and give someone the opportunity to thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I process internet orders and provide customer support for a company started by a local entrepreneur with customers around the world.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: To help others have the opportunity to change their quality of life.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help others, and it doesn't take much to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse with children who have lifelong disabilities. Our goal is to "Cure Pity".

lender.name: David, Sunita, and Anju
lender.loan_because: i believe people are worth investing in

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Everybody has moments in their life where one is determined to do something and just needs a little bit of help. This platform lets you help people at the right time and for the right reason. I love the entrepreneurial spirit and its power. This is what can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I do a lot of Internet based marketing activities. I love to travel (42 countries so far) and spend time with friends and family, and I like sports (run, bike, sail, scuba dive). "The barbarian thinks that his is the only culture." - Anonymous

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: To payback help I have received in my life.

lender.name: Lee and Danielle
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Experiencing a stimulating learning environment daily (student).

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: Having lived in a third world country, I felt frustrated and discouraged witnessing the lack of job opportunities for people who sincerely wanted to work. I believe in the American dream and through loaning I hope to extend this ideal globally.
lender.occupational_info: I do outside work and maintenance for a small business, performing tasks such as mowing, weeding, small repairs and general upkeep of the office.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Its fun!
lender.occupational_info: I design semiconductor laser diodes (similar to those found in cd players and optical mice) for use in medical, industrial, and defense systems.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe we have an obligation to help lift others up, especially when we are--by chance and luck--born into one of the wealthiest nations in the world.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I understand how privileged I am in this world. I understand that my success, and the success of my community, has come at the expense of others laboring in third world economies with political and economic institutions continuously suppressed by our overseeing hand. Direct micro financing through Kiva feels rewarding because I can try to help those who have, knowingly or unknowingly, helped me live my life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with plants on a microscopic level to try and figure out how they grow. I look at their genes and their proteins. I then use that knowledge to help them grow in a better, more sustainable way.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful program and it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: MAZE
lender.loan_because: it helps.

lender.name: Dinh
lender.loan_because: I need money to buy a computer for my bussiness work.
lender.occupational_info: I trade coffee.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I started a secretarial burea but I need more capital to boost the business. Am in Entebbe, Uganda and I need a loan of 1,500 Dollars as a loan to be paid back later
lender.occupational_info: I type proposals and laminating for customers and once I have picked up I will pay after some time. And being a single mum with 2 children its not easy, So I would be grateful if u consider my request. Thanking you in advance

lender.name: Tino Kuhl
lender.loan_because: i can do it.
lender.occupational_info: i am the owner of a bundle of websites and webpages about kredit and other financial stuff. with help of search engines, you can find my kredit-projects by using the words kredit or kreditvergleich, kredit vergleich or onlinekredit and kredite. check it out:)

lender.name: Bernard
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I help organisations re-structure their operations to help them work in a more efficient way

lender.name: Ludalle
lender.loan_because: it is not a hand out but rather a step up and I can feel good about helping someone help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer @ Waukesha Memorial Hospital in Medical Oncology in my retirement. I help cancer patients thru their treatments

lender.name: AMERICAS HOMEPLACE INC
lender.loan_because: AMERICAS HOMEPLACE INC
lender.occupational_info: AMERICAS HOMEPLACE INC

lender.name: Ralf
lender.occupational_info: Man kann etwas bewegen ! Handeln statt reden !

lender.name: Lisa-Anne
lender.loan_because: It's an expression of my Catholic faith.

lender.name: Vicky Lynn
lender.loan_because: I want to help. Paying it forward is always a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office as an assistant to two executives. I schedule meetings, make travel arrangements, prepare presentations and correspondence - anything necessary to make the office run smoothly.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for all that I have and want to share with someone who has less. I believe that everyone should have the basic necessities of life and is entitled to equal opportunity. My loans contribute to creating that for others.
lender.occupational_info: I help employees at the company I work for learn what they need to in order to be successful in their jobs.

lender.name: Pascal Vuylsteker
lender.loan_because: Too high gap between rich and poor is bad for everybody, even, in the end, for the rich.
lender.occupational_info: Provide solutions to help people to better use the web ant the internet

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: If I can do a little to help someone succeed, I'm all for it!
lender.occupational_info: I devise and implement strategies to help my employer sell his products and grow his business. This might include work on promotions, displays, web sites, etc.

lender.name: Suresh
lender.loan_because: I need US$850,000 of startup loan for my business ventures (latest self-automated kiosk settings) in all asia region countries.
lender.occupational_info: Im working as Manager and currently have two management team lead. Im planning to venture latest self-automated Kiosk to accomodate government / private sector.

lender.name: Mari
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help run a program, called Judi's House, where children and their care givers who have had a death loss can come for free. In a huge old house in a big city I talk to everyone, schedule everything, and make differ for 100 people four nights a week.

lender.name: Kamil
lender.occupational_info: investment

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I designed new medical devices.

lender.name: searra
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do! It makes me smile to know I am helping someone make their life better...=)
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student graduating in the fall with a Social Science degree. I plan on using this to teach high school students.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I believe in capitalism. I believe that by making low cost capital available to entrepreneurs, small personal economies will change one at a time leading to a great benefit for everyone. Poverty comes from systemic exploitation and a deliberate restriction of capital. We can change that.
lender.occupational_info: I help internet users find educational furniture and equipment to purchase on my company's website.

lender.name: CLIFTON_CLASSROOM
lender.occupation: Classroom of Students at Shaughnessy Elementary
lender.loan_because: We are students who would like to make a difference globally, paying it forward, one step at a time.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: it makes my heart feel good to be able to help someone else as others have helped me.

lender.name: Erin Rose
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to give back and support inspired ideas.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find homes, and sell their old one. I also teach people how to make money by investing in extra properties so that they have additional cash flow.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: many people have helped me. I want to pass that on.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: it has a direct positive impact on an individual's life!

lender.name: Murray
lender.occupational_info: I help people find homes...

lender.name: nicki
lender.loan_because: I like helping people who help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help update large computer systems for the United States government

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: So many people in underdeveloped countries have brains and energy and ingenuity and a will to succeed. All they lack is capital. That's where I come in. I love helping people to start or grow a business.

lender.name: AAA Camano Storage
lender.loan_because: It is my responsibility and privilege to offer others an opportunity to create better lives for themselves through their business. In my opinion Kiva offers the most efficient and sustainable method to accomplish that end.
lender.occupational_info: We assist others in storing their extra belongings, household goods and/or business inventory, we also offer truck rental and moving supply sales to the communities we serve.

lender.name: Carsten
lender.loan_because: I believe in building a better world step by step

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to connect with and help people across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an art gallery and I work on my own artwork when I have the time.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I have a lot to be thankful for.
lender.occupational_info: I make clothing fit properly. I create measurements, grading and patterns that get sent to other countries for production.

lender.name: gavin
lender.loan_because: i'm 13 years old, and i've dicovered that your never too young to help someone...
lender.occupational_info: i mow lawns and help around my relative's houses'

lender.name: Krista Spyker
lender.loan_because: To help those much less fortunate than I think I maybe at any given time in life.
lender.occupational_info: Helping customers find what they are looking for with a smile on my face.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: "Denouncing evil is a far cry from doing good." - Philip Gourevitch

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to empower people and provide them the tools and opportunities to achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I help people create income to live their dreams.

lender.name: BetaBoy Studios
lender.loan_because: As a small businessman myself, I really enjoy the idea that my small efforts can help someone who needs it - no matter where they happen to do business.

lender.name: Velays
lender.loan_because: We have lived in Africa, Asia and Latin America and we like to see spirited people bettering their lives and their communities.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I truly believe in micro-lending to help lift people out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I give advice to banks on how to improve their businesses

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I like happy people!

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is being alone with a child even though I live in Germany...
lender.occupational_info: I manage a little store selling erotic toys, movies and clothes

lender.name: Ari
lender.loan_because: I love to help people
lender.occupational_info: Design websites

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I believe this can work

lender.name: Retronyms
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: YOUNGJU
lender.loan_because: It is my honor to be a seed for prosperity of others.
lender.occupational_info: I help my client's management in their improving process, compliance with regulations, etc.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: I want to help people have a better life, so they, in turn, may help others. Pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: I act and direct in the professional theatre. I teach acting as well.

lender.name: Bartek
lender.loan_because: I know there are places in the world where it takes a lot of courage and creativity to earn the living. If there are people out there who want to make a difference for themselves and they are only lacking funds it would be a waste of their energy not to support them:) It feels good to help :)

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of our money being used to invest in the development of areas in need of a jump start. It's sent with a purpose and bounces around the local economy, creating opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a part of a team that designs airplanes for airlines around the world.

lender.name: Adil
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with the ability to do so. I believe that if we wish to bring more peace and happiness throughout this world, we need to do our best to help those that are less fortunate; and because I'm not yet at a point in my life where I can help on a larger scale, I loan via Kiva.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I received a gift certificate for my birthday.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit Ballet Company

lender.name: Kathleen and Eric
lender.loan_because: We feel lucky to have been given a lot of opportunities in our lives, and we'd love to help others be given opportunities to create the lives they want as well.

lender.name: Wedensday Meditation
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world that brings peace and a better standard of living, and because Kiva is a gift to the world!
lender.occupational_info: There are 6 members of our meditation Group, we all hold important jobs. 2 of us are beautifully guiding and raising the next generation, 1 works for a newspaper and is a gorgeous step-mother, friend and sister, 1 runs a business and loves yoga, 1 lives her life bringing beauty to the world and is a wonderful Mother and Grand Mother and 1 is an author and friend of the angels.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: It feels good to share.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: The right thing at the right time for the right reasons.
lender.occupational_info: I support the classroom teacher so they can be better teachers.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I believe in providing a hand up rather than a hand out. I respect and admire all those working to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a bookkeeper. I keep track of the money that my employer earns and keep track of what he spends so he can make good business decisions. This keeps the business growing and provides many of my community members with good jobs.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: If's such a blessing to help someone else achieve success. It's very contagious to keep giving and giving!!
lender.occupational_info: I help women and children who are victims of abuse.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: It's a great opportunity to give back.

lender.name: Sydney
lender.loan_because: that's how I roll. :P

lender.name: Manuel
lender.loan_because: it's just.

lender.name: Carine
lender.loan_because: I have been to Ghana and I am passionate about doing what I can to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that publishes educational books and online resources for university and college students.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because:
It's the least I can do.
"If you want to live a long life, continue to help others."

lender.name: TAKAHIRO
lender.loan_because: Peace&Natural Mind

lender.name: Leslie T
lender.loan_because: I like to help alleviate poverty especially in war-torn countries. This gives others a chance to start or expand their businesses, giving them a decent livelihood and their families a better future.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: If I can help someone get started, I consider that the best way to use my money. My hope is that someday the people I help will be in a position to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university professor. I specialize in cross-cultural psychology and my passion is teaching. Once again, if I can help someone get started...in this case with a solid understanding of other cultures...then my time on this planet has been well spent.

lender.name: Andrew & Sarah
lender.loan_because:
James 1:27 - Pure and genuine religion in the sight of God the Father means caring for orphans and widows in their distress and refusing to let the world corrupt you.
Luke 3:11 - John replied, “If you have two shirts, give one to the poor. If you have food, share it with those who are hungry."
Psalm 15:5 - Those who lend money without charging interest, and who cannot be bribed to lie about the innocent. Such people will stand firm forever.
Proverbs 28:27 - Whoever gives to the poor will lack nothing, but those who close their eyes to poverty will be cursed.
lender.occupational_info: Andrew works on computers for his company and Sarah is a writer who tutors students in English, grammar, and creative writing.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in someone else's life and help them improve their livelihood.
lender.occupational_info: I can't work because I had a car accident 8 years ago and now I'm in a wheelchair.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel like a better person. Everybody should do it. We're not all lucky.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a university student and I work one shift a week at a fast food store half an hour away. I am hoping to one day become a primary school teacher so that I can also teach them the value of giving to others.

lender.name: Gracie
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a very real and effective way to make a difference to many people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a first year University student studying Business majoring in Public Relations. I also work part time in retail.

lender.name: Dominique
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance in life.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I study at a university, and work with children

lender.name: ania
lender.loan_because: i am able to

lender.name: geoff
lender.loan_because: i can!
lender.occupational_info: i look after the kids befor school

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: reading about these people makes me realise just how lucky I am and good fortune is only worth something if it is shared.
lender.occupational_info: work at living happily

lender.name: Tarlee
lender.occupational_info: I organise childcare for children aged 5 to 15 for after school, before school and during school holidays.

lender.name: Ami
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand in life
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently completing my honours degree at university

lender.name: Pily and Gerry
lender.loan_because: i want to give something back. There have been alot of people out there who have helped me and i want to "pay it forward"
lender.occupational_info: I work in a bank, helping people decide what accounts to open and what is best for their situation. I also help people get loans through the bank to buy houses, cars or whatever they need the loan for.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get ahead and make ideas possible when cash is scarce.
lender.occupational_info: I sew costumes and evening wear, and I run my own small business.

lender.name: jodie ward
lender.loan_because: i want to give someone the opportunity to improve their lives and also those around them. Educate children and to improve living conditions for those in need.
lender.occupational_info: my husband runs a small business and I help him. I am also a mother to 3 young boys which keeps us busy.

lender.name: Oiaji San
lender.loan_because:
I have read that giving charity helps ammend for my sins, this is why I give a lot of Charity.
I process ETA Holiday visas for Australia. EtaVisa.com link below

lender.name: Kelly-anne
lender.loan_because: Have always felt a need to help people less fortunate than me.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people to help themselves, in a productive and sustainable manner.
lender.occupational_info: I am a businessman who wants to make a difference. Attitude is everything.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: Becuase I am better off than alot of other people in the world, I believe everybody should have a chance at having a good life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently on a disability pension. I suffer from a lung illness called Cystic Fibrosis. I also study tourism.

lender.name: vankemenade family
lender.loan_because: i want to help
lender.occupational_info: i love being a mum, my daughter is autisic and i love her the way she is.. and that how i see life . love and give..

lender.name: Clara and Matt
lender.loan_because: We believe we need to form a global community where people take care of each other and feel bound together regardless of ethnicity and religion.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I feel like I am helping someone in need, to make their life and the lives of their family and community better.
lender.occupational_info: Fulfilling.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: its an absolute privilege to be able to give something to help someone else. A recent trip to Kenya was a life changing experience, can't wait to go back.
lender.occupational_info: I organize a small number of workers from our home office, doing plumbing work on peoples homes. Fixing taps and toilets and broken pipes etc.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: sometimes people just need to be given the chance to soar.. :-)

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I care about people and want good opportunities for people who are less fortunate than myself.

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand sometime in their life!
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother to 4 children - that speaks for itself.

lender.name: Vesta
lender.loan_because: Because at the end of the day we are all human beings - and that is all that we are.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.occupation: Teacher but now a mum at home
lender.loan_because: It is an easy way for me to help someone else.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: It's right

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: To be able to help others is a wonderful thing :) Especially when they are motivated and prepared to work hard for results :)
lender.occupational_info: Most of my time is spent working on my online business...

lender.name: Rhiannon
lender.loan_because: I would rather use my savings to help change peoples lives for the better than assist a bank in increasing their already enormous profits. What better gift to give than to enable someone to be empowered to change their own destiny and have bright hopes for the future.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a Nickel mine in outback Western Australia. I issue permits for maintenance personnel to ensure work on machinery is done safely.

lender.name: douglas
lender.loan_because: giving for food is not enough, giving so they can fend for themselves makes sense to me.
lender.occupational_info: I search for old shipwrecks

lender.name: Lyndal & Alex
lender.loan_because: there is never a bad time to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: helping people with illness or disability makes the most of their skills through rehabilitation, changing the task process or by changing the environment to suit them.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate that i can
lender.occupational_info: i work in a university library shelving books.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about giving to those less fortunate. I am also passionate about liberating women and assisting them to gain the freedom to live their lives.

lender.name: Alisha
lender.loan_because: everybody needs a helping hand
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying Primary education

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I was just so happy to hear about Kiva-what a magnificent idea-helping others to enable them to earn a decent living & thereby support their families/communities. Hooray!
lender.occupational_info: My husband & I have been growers of field-grown trees for 27 years. We have also built our home (log cabin), sheds etc from timber grown & harvested from our property, & also milled here. My husband is also a very keen woodcrafter/inventor, so, the idea of helping these entrepeneurs appeals.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I can. I want to try to make a difference in people's lives. I have benefitted from an education and life opportunities that I could only have dreamed of as a younger person. Lending with Kiva is one of the most exciting things I have ever done.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a family counsellor with the parent carers (and other members of a person's network) of people diagnosed with cancer. I also work in liaison with a major University to promote social work research in the oncology setting.

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people just need a little helping hand.

lender.name: SUZANNE
lender.loan_because: WE CAN ALL DO A LITTLE TO HELP EACH OTHER
lender.occupational_info: I'M A FULLTIME CARER FOR MY HANDICAPED DAUGHTER AND MY YOUNG SON

lender.name: Jeremiah
lender.loan_because: I am evil.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I know that my money is worth a lot more in some other countries so if I can help some other people achieve their goals, why not?! Also, to have some great ideas & not be able to put them into action due to lack of money is very frustrating (I know how that feels too!) & so I like to support entrepreneurial people. Good luck Isha, Shamil & Mohommad!
lender.occupational_info: My work involves doing surveys with people in order to glean certain information, or simply to find out how people are feeling about a specific product. This is called market research - researching a market for a given purpose. I work for quite a few different market research companies, whose clients can be anyone from a bank to a soft drink company. Having said that, I hope to be more entrepreneurial in the future! Having said that, I'm hoping to set up an ebay business of my own & am researching this on my own time at the moment, as I would rather work for myself - so yes, I'm a budding entrepreneur too! And sorry about the lack of photo - I just bought a decent digital camera, so hopefully you'll be seeing one soon.....

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I loan because I think it's a fantastic idea. I like the idea of being able to assist someone to achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work with intellectually disabled adults in a group home. I help them to learn skills, and become part of the community

lender.name: jody
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic idea and i just would love to be apart of it.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: If you think you can, you CAN! If you think you can’t, you’re right. If you think you can do something, you’ll find a way to do it. You will turn obstacles and failures into learning experiences for your growth. Challenges then become something you can work through and learn from. Similarly, if you think you can’t do something or that failing is bad, you will let these very same challenges stop you. You will point to them as the reasons why you won’t succeed. Because successful people exist on the leading edge of thought and innovation, they run up against more challenges than the average person. They have many more failures than most because they’re always going for it. They don’t let themselves be stopped by challenges, and neither should you.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Wife and Mother of 3 children aged 23, 21 and 11 years old. I am an Investor and a Health Researcher

lender.name: Moni & Mad
lender.loan_because: We want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: Students - go to school

lender.name: Paula & Adam
lender.loan_because: We were always telling our son to appreciate how lucky he was compared to others in the world and thought it was about time we did something to help instead of just sitting back & doing nothing.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Love that I can help people with similar interests to myself that are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: As well as full time Mum, I love to motivate people to get fit and healthy.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people who are less fortunate than myself.

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and be apart of changing the world.
lender.occupational_info: I sell ready made meals to people

lender.name: Jacquie
lender.loan_because: I am very lucky to live in a country like Australia. Although I am not wealthy, I live very comfortably compared to people in many other countries and I want to try and help others have a better standard of living. I think Kiva is a fantastic idea, and I especially like the fact that it allows people to come together and just by giving a little help make a real difference to the lives of the people who receive these loans. Everyone deserves a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked at the University of Melbourne since 1990. My job is to help staff and students. At the moment I manage a department that trains paediatric doctors and nurses.

lender.name: Singing Nuns
lender.loan_because: It gives me a feeling of satisfaction to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I have an entertainment group who raise money to help children with cancer.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I am a blessed person living in a fantastic Country, I have nothing to worry about compared to most of the people on this website, If everyone gives a little then it can make a massive dfference
lender.occupational_info: I am a Mother, a wife and a hairdresser

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I know that a small amount of my money can make a big difference in the lives of people overseas and I love helping others share my success
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses be successful by helping the owners think big, set goals and take massive action

lender.name: Renate
lender.loan_because: We need to help each other to create love and trust in the world, and make the world better for all people.
lender.occupational_info: I advertise for work in construction and then i hire tradespeople to do the work.

lender.name: Kylie
lender.whereabouts: Far North Coast New South Wales

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I hope to help give other people a chance at improving their quality of life and build a better future for themselves and their communities.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: It is a small way in which I can help my fellow beings improve and enrich their lives. Giving not only helps others but it gives me a fantastic feeling of community.
lender.occupational_info: I am someone who listens to people with problems and helps them to find ways of solving those problems. My main interest lies with children with behavioural and sleep problems.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I am an active volunteer and my friends created my initial Kiva account as a gift for my 70th birthday. They thought it would be a perfect way to extend my volunteer interests... they were right!!!
lender.occupational_info: I retired from my career as a corporate attorney 13 years ago and since then have had an active life as a volunteer principally in areas of children"s literacy both in my home city and abroad.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: from little things..big things grow.
lender.occupational_info: contemporary artwork

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I live in the lucky country and want to share with others
lender.occupational_info: I live and work on our family farm, we grow crops such as wheat, barley, canola & hay and also have merino sheep and 2 steers!

lender.name: jodi
lender.loan_because: God loves people and this is a fantastic way to be his hands and feet!
lender.occupational_info: Mum of 3 little ones aged 2, 6 and 8. Married to a wonderful man, Love Jesus, Love singing, Am an Emergency Nurse at a major Melbourne hospital.

lender.name: Allyson
lender.loan_because: Their are many people worse off than me and little bit given helps. I admire women who try to overcome their financial position.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school students (teenagers).

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: This has to be the best way to give a hand up. The money keeps coming back so I can use it over and over. Its brilliant! So grateful to the KIVA staff.
lender.occupational_info: I work from my home computer

lender.name: Kyli
lender.loan_because: no matter how small a contribution, and in any form, it makes a difference.

lender.name: Erica
lender.occupational_info: I help companies manage their finances.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: Auditor

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I do Admin at a Theme Park.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: WHY NOT HELP SOMEONE ELSE
lender.occupational_info: Livestock accounting

lender.name: Regan
lender.loan_because: Its the least I can do
lender.occupational_info: Helping to heal

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I want to help them create a better life for themselves and their families and achieve their dreams

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: I like this idea & i think it can really make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I run the wait staff in a restaurant. I enjoy my work & take great pride in it

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: the fact that I can afford to spend a little bit of extra money on something like this means I can help do something meaningful for someone who has to struggle to survive every day. Everyone should do this :)

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: The gift of giving is a gift that keeps giving - just pass it on and pay it forward - it feels Great :)
lender.occupational_info: Owner of a Fashion Jewellery Wholesale Business. I have been running my own Mail order business for over 8 years.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: it matters
lender.occupational_info: cooking wide range of cuisine eg Australian, Asian,French

lender.name: Norma
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the health and wellbeing of my own family. I appreciate the opportunity and being able to support people who are working hard for their own families, often in very difficult circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a large team of psychologists, speech pathologists, social workers, specialist teachers and occupational therapists who provide support services to students in all the government schools in our area.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to do better for themselves, their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor for horses. I appreciate people who work and care for livestock. I hope that everyone treats these animals with respect and cares for them to the best of their ability. The better the animals are treated, the more productive they will be.

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: "If you give a man a fish you feed him for a day. if you teach a man to fish you feed him for a lifetime" Old Proverb
lender.occupational_info: I help young children with disabilites in their swimming and water safety programs

lender.name: Chris & Branko
lender.loan_because: It's time to give back
lender.occupational_info: Branko's work makes sure power/energy gets to people's homes and companies. Chris' work makes sure computers work.

lender.name: June
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to try to "level the playing field" while allowing people to retain their self-respect and pride.
lender.occupational_info: I sort mail in the morning, but am semi-retired (which means I have time, at last, to read lots of books)

lender.name: Darriel
lender.loan_because: opportunities are to be passed on once given to you.
lender.occupational_info: I write to share stories.

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because: I think it is a moral issue to help those who want to change their lives and just need a little investment capital to get them moving along
lender.occupational_info: I help communities provide clean renewable energy with solar and wind. We help build off grid water pumping systems and provide high efficiency lighting.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I recieved a small loan when I was young and together with hard work it helped me become prosperious today.
lender.occupational_info: Testing oil and gas pipes and tanks to ensure safety and plan maintenance.

lender.name: Team Hewitt
lender.loan_because: I believe it is better to give than to receive. I also believe that work helps people to move forward and out of an unfortunate poverty cycle.
lender.occupational_info: Help within the school classroom or office.

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: what seems like a small amount to us in developed countries will help small business owners in developing countries empower themselves and provide a livelihood for their families.

lender.name: GLORIA
lender.loan_because: a little bit of help can go a long way
lender.occupational_info: very rewarding

lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because: i want to help people to enable them to help themselves.we are very luck here in australia and i am grateful for that..
lender.occupational_info: my work is quite stressful.i work for a courier trucking company as as a freight coordinator,customer service,and call centre.I wear different hats.

lender.name: seve
lender.loan_because: I have a fortunate life. I wish a fortunate life for others.
lender.occupational_info: i play music I teach surfing

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I am truly blessed.

lender.name: Chrissie
lender.loan_because: I have just been to Africa and cannot believe the poverty that exists and I want to help everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own financial planning business in Perth. I advise people how to look after their money so thath they can save for their retirement. I also give advice on personal insurances.

lender.name: Tim & Teresa
lender.loan_because: Fulfilling dreams is what life is all about. Helping others fill theirs. helps me fill mine. Peace.

lender.name: Belinda & Garrick
lender.loan_because: It's simple and effective, it hopefully will be sustainable and teach persistance, resourcefulness and resiliance
lender.occupational_info: We take books into our store, give the person credit for them, the amount depending on the type and quality of the books, and they can use that credit to reduce the cash price of the books in the shop by up to 70%. They can choose whether they want to keep the books they buy forever, or return them after they have read them and receive 40% of the normal cash price of the book back again in store credit. For example if a person received the full 70% discount a $9.95 book becomes a purchase of only $3, if they return the book in good condition they recieve $4 in store credit to use on the next book purchase.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: GOD has blessed me with being able to give to bless others. When we loan rather than give a hand out it empowers others then perhaps one day they will have the oppertunity to pass it on
lender.occupational_info: i have recently returned from a mission trip to Kempala and Lira, Uganda. I really enjoyed working with the young people over there

lender.name: Kez
lender.loan_because: I want to help out.
lender.occupational_info: Aged Care

lender.name: Helen and Ryan
lender.loan_because: I think the concept is outstanding, giving the recipients the opportunity to support themselves, and so they're not just accepting charity, giving them self respect which is incredibly deserved. It's a fantastic idea, and once this loan is repaid we will lend the money to another deserving person.
lender.occupational_info: I am disabled and sometimes sell jewellery on Ebay. My son Ryan is a student and is very enthusiastic about lending money to help someone start to support themselves.

lender.name: Selena
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference to others!
lender.occupational_info: I own a motorcycle rental and tour business in Sydney. I also have a motorcycle clothing business for women.

lender.name: Kowboyy
lender.loan_because: want to help.

lender.name: Bethanie
lender.occupational_info: I am a fulltime mother. The best job in the world! Fortunately my husband is a carpenter and this allows me the privelege to stay home and raise our son.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I know people are not as lucky to be born in Australia as I was
lender.occupational_info: I run a small motel in the coal mining area of Queensland Australia and have a vegetable garden.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: I am very lucky as I have shelter, my children are happy, healthy, and never go hungry. I have a wonderful husband who supports me in what I do and I wish to give someone else the same opportunities that my children take for granted.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: I believe the principle of paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I manage projects to make changes to computer systems...and make sure they still work after we change it... or at least that is what I do when I work...right now I am a stay at home Mum to baby Joshua :)

lender.name: Sasha & Yogi
lender.loan_because: I was lucky to be borne in a country where I had better posibilities and i am happy that I might be able to make a difference to somebodies life.

lender.name: kelly
lender.loan_because: We share the worlds resouces unfairly and i have enough for my family so i like to share with others to help them grow and take care of their families.
lender.occupational_info: i look at peoples health and try to find out why some people get sick or diseased and why other people who are the same, dont.

lender.name: melaine
lender.loan_because: we all want to care for those around us. if we can help people do this we will.
lender.occupational_info: we try to love and care for people around us

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: I live in Australia and had have many wonderful opportunities in life and am fortunate enough to be in a position where I can contribute
lender.occupational_info: I am a Travel/Tourism student

lender.name: Meagan
lender.loan_because: From little things big things grow.

lender.name: Spida
lender.loan_because: After my Heavenly Father above my family is the most important part of my life... Why not help someone who loves and wants a future for thier FAMILY... I wish them all the luck.
lender.occupational_info: Where i am in life today I Thank Our Heavenly Father above Our LORD JESUS CHRIST for his Love and Forgiveness XxX

lender.name: Mark Field
lender.loan_because: I have spent considerable time in the back blocks of Malaysia and Borneo and have experienced first-hand the spirit of these rural areas. I am very inspired by the dedication to family and community that a lot of these villagers display and have invested some of my money and a whole lot of my encouragement to support my brothers and sister in other parts of the world. Let's all keep up the good work ...and continue to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Mrs Dabbs
lender.loan_because: To help less fortunate people to have a better life
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer worker for Birds Australia. To conserve and research birds in the wild

lender.name: The Elliott Family
lender.loan_because: we want to teach our children the value of helping others who are in need and trying to make a go of it for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We help people who are injured, disabled or in pain to rehabilitate and improve their function.

lender.name: Serani
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I cannot ignore that I would not miss $25 but to another person it can change their world. I am very involved in Animal Rights and already donate to Greenpeace and ChildFund but I wanted to give money to women who make a difference to the lives of their families. I am really excited about Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Neonatal and Paediatric Intensive Care Registered Nurse in Australia. I care for babies who are born up to 16 weeks early and also critically ill children up to the age of 14 years. I am happily partnered by an awesome woman and we have 4 beautiful daughters between us. My life is blessed!

lender.name: Paul
lender.whereabouts: Surry Hills, Sydney New South Wales
lender.loan_because: i'm thrilled to be able to help make a difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: i work as a waiter/manager in one of the best restaurants in sydney's tourist area.

lender.name: Merrilyn
lender.loan_because: a small positive action can make such a difference.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I care and because i know that micro finance and empowering women is how to end global poverty.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Seva
lender.loan_because: ... I like to give people the opportunity to keep up their livelihood with proud and dignity. The idea of kiva is great!
lender.occupational_info: I am managing customer projects within a large IT company.

lender.name: Lyn
lender.occupation: mum who works from home & home schools

lender.name: Marianna
lender.loan_because: I think it is such a worthwhile thing to help someone who is willing to try to improve their lives and just need a little hand. It is fantastic to see loans being repaid and then loaning again. More positive than just a donation.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small tour agency that provides services in Italy. I love what I do as it allows me to help people really experience their time in Italy and get the most out of their trip.

lender.name: Shaun and Sharyn
lender.loan_because:
One person can be a positive change in someones life!
We want to help the impoverished.
We want to contribute to this world we share.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: To keep that circulation of energy and opportunity open to everybody across the globe
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother to 3 boys

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: We should all help one another
lender.occupational_info: I work with troubled children and adolescents

lender.name: Den & Ivica
lender.loan_because: We cannot help everyone but everyone can help someone

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: It's frustrating waiting for the governments of first world countries to prioritise helping those in need. Poverty and preventable diseases in third world countries should be a thing of the past. I loan directly because I know every dollar goes to where it's needed rather than being lost in administration and red tape.
lender.occupational_info: I am raising three beautiful girls in Sydney, Australia

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to pass on some of my good fortune in life to others.
lender.occupational_info: As a nurse and a teacher, I care for people and pass on information to them-compassion and education are important . Even though life has been difficult for me at times , I appreciate how lucky I am to live where I do.

lender.name: Jeanene
lender.loan_because: It's a great opportunity to help others
lender.occupational_info: I am very blessed to be able to stay home to look after our 6 beautiful children. Shania, Silas, Reuben, Elliarnah,Levi & Evie

lender.name: Jaycie
lender.loan_because: I want to start giving back because i have been fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I work at In N Out Burger as a manager.
